title: Who We Are - Badia
snippet: Badia Spices has been bringing families and flavors together for more than 50 years. What started in a small Miami garage with Joseph “Pepe” Badía and his father has grown into a global brand found in over 80 countries and trusted by 130+ customers worldwide.

title: Our Story - Badia
snippet: Established in 1967 by Jose Badia, Badia Spices is one of today’s leading family-owned Hispanic food companies. Badia manufactures, packages, and distributes spices, seasoning blends, marinades, sauces, teas, health items and other products to more than 70 countries around the world.

title: All Products - Badia
snippet: Explore our wide range of high-quality products. Find the perfect solution for your needs.
